name: Língua
description:
Língua follows the adventure of Beto, a boy who lives in the rural northeast of Brazil. When the last of his small farm's animals goes missing, he sets out to explore the brazilian caatinga and bumps into a magical part of his world, meeting folkloric characters and helping them in a very important mission that will take him on a hybrid journey of magic and reality!



Solve puzzles!
Use the resources Beto finds in his journey to interact with elements of his surroundings and advance to your next destination!



Free spirits!
Use your magic slingshot to help animal spirits find their way to the beyond in bullet hell style battles!



Finish quests!
Help locals solve their problems through trading, exploration and minigames!
